website_summaries.verdict: The Denon HEOS 1 offers a rugged design and a great feature set to users who want the flexibility of both multiroom music and optional Bluetooth portability.
pros: The Denon HEOS 1 offers a rugged build and decent audio quality in an affordable package
The HEOS app is easy to use and attractive-looking
The addition of the HEOS Go package for $99 offers a lot of flexibility including battery power, splashproofing and Bluetooth
cons: The HEOS without the Go pack isn't as compelling
Setup of wireless requires a proprietary cable
The app can behave oddly and the number of services pales in comparison to Sonos
For audiophiles there's no high-res support

customer_reviews.title: This is a great speaker and sounds wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is a great speaker and sounds wonderful. Certainly a huge step up from just having our laptops open in a given room. The support for some of the music services are pretty good, but the Amazon integration definitely needs work, and the lack of Google Play support is unfortunate. You can still use play by conncting via the AUX port, but obviously that requires tying your device to the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Bainter

customer_reviews.title: The software is terrible, and for some reason seems to be getting ...
customer_reviews.text: The software is terrible, and for some reason seems to be getting worse. I should have listened and bought Sonos. I have 5 of these right now and still might scrap them to get Sonos. Each time I wish to listen to them I have to spend 10 minutes screwing around with them to get them to work and/or group. The only way to turn them off is to unplug them. = JUNK
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: About to order another one of these great portable speakers which I now use with my digital iPod.
customer_reviews.author: N. Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and Level
customer_reviews.text: Added to my Heoes Cinema and three other units around my living space and as usual great Product from Denon good quality sound and surprisingly loud for as small as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Subzero121800

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Completely satisfied. I would order again and/or tell a friend about this one. Thanks again Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Wogd

customer_reviews.title: I'm so pleased with my new speaker
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased with my new speaker. The sound is amazing, it carries through both my living room and kitchen. The base of the trouble is perfect. And it was easy to set up. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Ruth C Galasso

customer_reviews.title: Superlative sound.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to add to my HEOS 5 speaker. Amazing sound. I'm absolutely delighted!
customer_reviews.author: Thinking

customer_reviews.title: worked great for 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in June, worked great for 3 months. then it broke. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Larson

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up EXCEPT that it does not work with the Denon receiver I purchased. I guess I am too naïve to realize that even though the receiver was Bluetooth enabled that it is only "Receiving" files from devices not sending sound out to wireless speakers. Found out later the real solution (and cheaper) is a wireless transmitter/receiver that can connect wired speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Got 7 HEOS: one heos 1, three heos 3, one heos 5, one heos 7, heos link for Denon 1912 home theater Works fine with iPhone 5, 6, 6S and Samsung S5 PRO: - great sound, better than SONOS - DLNA standard so I can stream from my Windows computer music collection via iTunes - whole house plays the same song or different songs - 2.4ghz and 5ghz wifi - Amazon Prime - Tunein - Pandora CON: - Spotify freebie doesn't work with HEOS unless you buy Spotify Premium. - App needs a shortcut to go straight to my MUSIC SERVER >> BROWSE >> AUDIO >> FOLDERS >> iTunes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent wi-fi speaker but overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: I had no issues with setting up the speaker and apps. It works well enough and the sound quality is decent, better than bluetooth receiver. The build feels solid and the ability to play in humid environment is a plus. I am not a fan of the angular design, however; but that is a personal taste. Overall, I am glad I received this unit for free from Amazon Vine. However, I definitely would not have purchased the HEOS 1 at full price, unless, the GO pack is included.
customer_reviews.author: P. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great room filling sound
customer_reviews.text: Audiophile quality, I originally the S_n_s 1, but found the soundstage dissapointing. It sounded great, but if you were not right in front of it, it sounded muffled. With the Heos 1, music is much more open, sounds great throughout the room. The Heos App has all the major streaming services, I use Amazon music and Iheart radio, both sound fantastic. If you are picky about music quality, you can't do better than this little powerhouse.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality. Denon has done a great job getting genuine HiFi sound out of such a small package. Sounds better than Sonos Play 1. It's better across the entire frequency range than the Play 1 which sounds tinny in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: O.R. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Purchased the heos 1 and comparable sonos play 1 at ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the heos 1 and comparable sonos play 1 at a brick and mortar store to test sound range and quality. Quality is comparable, but the sonos 1 seems to have more range and low end bass. The sonos app is less buggy. Taking the heos 1 back and keeping the sonos play 1. Move up to heos 5 or 7 or sonos 5 if you want more bass.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgiaT

customer_reviews.title: Too frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Their software is absolutely awful. My android phone consistently loses the device and I have to reconnect. About 75% of the time I want to listen to music this happens. I'd give one star but when it does work the sound is not bad. I just wish it worked. I'm sorry I purchased and would not do so again. Already shopping for a replacement Sonos.
customer_reviews.author: S.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound - poor bluetooth pairing
customer_reviews.text: Sound is very good and clean, but connecting via Bluetooth is a pain. Every time I want to pair my phone with the speaker I have to disconnect the battery, wait 45 seconds and then pair it. So far I haven't found any other solution that works for this...
customer_reviews.author: Mikkel S.

customer_reviews.title: Not quite there yet.
customer_reviews.text: So it wants to be a Sonos. Well, it's not quite there yet. I still prefer the leader in this technology which everyone else is trying so hard to copy. Stick to the gold standard if you're going to spend anyway.
customer_reviews.author: CJM

product_meta.title: Denon HEOS 1 HS2 Wireless Speaker (Black) (New Version)
product_meta.description:
Denon HEOS1HS2BK Wireless Speaker System, Black Listen to your favorite audio tracks wirelessly, via Bluetooth and Wi-Fi audio streaming.

The compact enclosure features humidity resistance, making the HEOS 1 ideal for listening in damp or steamy environments, such as the bathroom.

Connect your favorite portable device directly to the HEOS 1 via the USB port. There's also a stereo line input for analog audio sources.

The HEOS 1 features advanced DSP (Digital Signal Processing) to deliver full range sound, with custom EQ sound tailoring that helps deliver a smooth, natural tonal balance, along with dual channel Class D digital audio amplification.
feature_bullets: Make sure your mobile device is connected to your wireless network before setting up your speaker.
Alternatively, you can connect your speaker to your network router using the included Ethernet cable. Once connected via
Ethernet, the HEOS by Denon App should recognize the speaker and you can manually move it to your wireless network using Settings/My Devices/Device_Name/Advanced/Network Settings.

Stream from your favorite music service such as Amazon Prime Music, Pandora, Spotify, TuneIn, iHeartRadio, SiriusXM, SoundCloud, TIDAL and Rhapsody on your free HEOS App for IOS, Android or Kindle device

Optional HEOS 1 GO Pack features a high capacity rechargeable lithium-ion battery that delivers 6 hours of playback time and includes a silicone splash guard to seal the jacks to protect from splashing water
